customer_addr:
1010 Miracle Strip Pkwy SE
Fort Walton Beach, FL 32548

citations.narrative:
During inspection there was paint at Sea lion South pool, housing 3 California sea lions, that is in need of repair. This
flaking paint can enter the water and impact the water quality or become an ingestion hazard to the sea lions.
Facilities where animals are housed must be maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury.
Correct by November 6, 2024

citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility does not have an environmental enhancement plan in place to promote the overall psychological well-being of
the birds at the facility. The facility currently has enrichment policies and approved enrichment devices that may be used
for the penguins, but the pelicans are not included in this plan. Exhibitors must develop, document and follow a species
appropriate plan for the environmental enhancement to promote the psychological well-being of the pelicans and
penguins that is within industry standards and approved by the attending veterinarian. This plan must be made available
for future inspections.
Correct by: Nov 6, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
Additional Inspectors:
David Mersereau, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
3.101(a)(1) 
   
Facilities, general. 
During inspection there was paint at Sea lion South pool, housing 3 California sea lions, that is in need of repair. This 
flaking paint can enter the water and impact the water quality or become an ingestion hazard to the sea lions. 
 
Facilities where animals are housed must be maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury. 
 
Correct by November 6, 2024 
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
The facility does not have an environmental enhancement plan in place to promote the overall psychological well-being of 
the birds at the facility. The facility currently has enrichment policies and approved enrichment devices that may be used 
for the penguins, but the pelicans are not included in this plan. Exhibitors must develop, document and follow a species 
appropriate plan for the environmental enhancement to promote the psychological well-being of the pelicans and 
penguins that is within industry standards and approved by the attending veterinarian. This plan must be made available 
for future inspections.  
 
Correct by: Nov 6, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
David Mersereau, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
